sentence2: Fluid is the term for a state of matter that yields to sideways or shearing forces.

sentence1: Just like there are currents in the ocean, our atmosphere has wind currents controlled by many of the same factors, including temperature differences, density differences, and the spin of the planet.
sentence2: Deep currents are caused by differences in density at the top and bottom of the ocean.

sentence1: CROSSING OVER The exchange of corresponding segments between chromatids of paired (homologous) chromosomes;
sentence2: Crossing-over is the term for the exchange of genetic material between non-sister chromatids of homologous chromosomes.
